data.title: Goal contribution of the best players
data.meta_description: I decided to share some additions to Pelé's list based on Brazil's national team from 1957-1962. I base this on the incredible work of Trachta10....
data.text:
Thank you so much! I think you are correct in everything

Maybe in the first one Gazeta seems to be more detailed and that for me is an indication of a more reliable description, but the fact that you have three different sources not mentioning a pass from Pelé, means that it is most likely that there was no pass from Pelé.

So I appreciate the help.

Do you think you can help me with the season 1959?

I can't find good sources for most of the games

Michael Laudrup's assist contributions from 1994/95 in La Liga:

Assist 1 to Zamorano vs Sevilla (a)

(Pre-assist vs Logrones (h) - on 2nd goal by Zamorano)

(Pre-assist vs Athletic Bilbao (h) - on 1st goal by Zamorano)

(Pre-assist vs Athletic Bilbao (h) - on 4th goal, by Amavisca)

Assist 2 to Amavisca vs Espanyol (a)

Assist 3 to Raul vs Atletico Madrid (h)

(Pre-assist vs Atletico Madrid (h) - on Zamorano's 2nd goal, Real Madrid's 4th)

Assist 4 to Zamorano vs Tenerife (h)

('Penalty assist' vs Real Sociedad (a) - fouled before penalty scored by Hierro)

Assist 5 to Zamorano vs Barcelona (h)

Assist 6 to Redondo vs Sporting Gijon (h)

Assist 7 to Zamorano vs Racing Santander (a)

Assist 8 to Zamorano vs Atletico Madrid (a)

(Pre-assist vs Deportivo La Coruna (h) - on 2nd goal, by Zamorano)

Not including a couple of pre-assists where a deflection or rebound happened.

So that means actually there was one less narrow La Liga assist by him than in each of the previous two seasons as it turns out (maybe I'd previously mis-identified one or two but I'm not sure - maybe I mis-remembered 94/95 seemingly having the highest tally), and in 89/90 it's very conceivable he had more too, and quite likely the most overall (but until it'd be confirmed he had one or two more than already identified maybe that can't be sure). Just 95/96 to go now as far as La Liga goes.

1995/96 in La Liga now:

Assist 1 to Raul vs Barcelona (h)

Assist 2 to Michel vs Sevilla (a)

Assist 3 to Raul vs Sevilla (h)

Assist 4 to Raul vs Rayo Vallecano (h)

Assist 5 to Raul vs Athletic Bilbao (a)

Assist 6 to Raul vs Real Betis (h)

(Pre-assist vs Real Betis (h) - on goal 3, by Zamarano)

Assist 7 to Raul vs Salamanca (h)

Assist 8 to Raul vs Real Sociedad (a)

(Pre-assist vs Celta Vigo (a) - on Zamorano goal)

(Pre-assist vs Real Vallodolid (a) - on 2nd goal, by Raul)

(Pre-assist vs Merida (h) - pass before penalty won for Michel penalty goal)
